title: Ticket #3983: STARTD_CRON_AUTOPUBLISH=If_Changed does not work
description:
The configuration setting 

    STARTD_CRON_AUTOPUBLISH = If_Changed

causes updates to be sent to the collector every time the cron job runs in some cases, even when there are no changes to the attributes generated by any cron jobs. The only case where it behaves as expected is when the cron jobs are all defined in the form 

    STARTD_CRON_<name>_PREFIX = <name>_

i.e. the prefix must be equal to the configuration name of the cron job followed by an underscore.
